headline: Newmont Profit, Revenue Jump, Boosted by Gold Surge
summary: The gold miner recorded a profit of $1.9 billion, or $1.68 a share, up from $179 million, or 15 cents a share, a year earlier.

headline: Newmont: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: DENVER (AP) — Newmont Corporation (NEM) on Wednesday reported first-quarter profit of $1.89 billion. On a per-share basis, the Denver-based company said it had net income of $1.68. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to $1.25 per share.
